question: How many inhabitants approximately live in the urban area of Jihlava, Czech Republic as of the most recent records?
asked_question_translated: Berapa banyak penduduk yang kira-kira tinggal di daerah perkotaan Jihlava, Republik Ceko pada catatan terakhir?
answer: Sekitar 50.000-51.000 penduduk tinggal di daerah perkotaan Jihlava, Republik Ceko berdasarkan catatan terakhir.
answer_translated_eng: About 50,000-51,000 people live in the urban area of Jihlava, Czech Republic according to the latest records.
